"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553c6b956368720727111600#post_553c6b956368720727111600
I haven't seen Battle of gods so I woudn't know.

The Main problem with Judging Saitama is that he's always holding back. (And we don't know by how much most of the time.)

Most of Saitama's fights are about as engaging to him as swatting at flies.

We do know that his serious series moves aren't 100% serious, But we don't know by how much.
